sen.j: 富野荘駅（とのしょうえき）は、京都府城陽市富野にある、近畿日本鉄道近鉄京都線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Tono of Joyo City, Kyoto Prefecture, Tonosho Station is a stop on the Kyoto Line, a Kintetsu Corporation Line.
Tonosho Station, located in Tono of Joyo City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Kyoto Line, a Kintetsu Corporation Line.
Tonosho Station, located in Tono of Joyo City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Kintetsu Kyoto Line of the Kintetsu Corporation.
sen.cmt: 他の記事と表現を統一し、of the Kintetsu Corporationとしました。

sen.j: 駅構造
sen.e: Station layout
Station layout
Station layout

sen.j: 相対式2面2線のホームを持つ駅。
sen.e: It is a station with two platforms opposite each other and double tracks.
It is a station with two platforms opposite each other and double tracks.
It is a station with two platforms opposite each other and two tracks in between.
sen.cmt: 表現を既出の記事と統一

sen.j: 改札・コンコースは地下、ホームは地上にある。
sen.e: Ticket gates and concourse are located underground and platforms above ground.
The ticket gates and concourse are located underground, and the platforms are above ground.
The ticket gates and concourse are located underground, and the platforms are above ground.

sen.j: ホーム有効長は6両。
sen.e: Effective length of platforms accommodates six cars.
The platforms have a length sufficient to accommodate six cars.
The platforms have a length sufficient to accommodate six cars.

sen.j: 改札口は東西2ヶ所にある。
sen.e: Ticket gates are located at two places, on the eastern and western sides.
The ticket gates are located at two places, on the eastern and western sides.
The ticket gates are located at two places, on the eastern and western sides.

sen.j: 駅入口は両ホームの大和西大寺寄りにある。
sen.e: The entrance ｔｏ the station is located towards the end of both platforms nearer Yamato-Saidaiji.
The entrance ｔｏ the station is located toward the end of both platforms nearer to Yamato-Saidaiji.
The entrance to the station is located toward the end of both platforms nearer to Yamato-Saidaiji.

sen.j: トイレは京都方面のホーム。
sen.e: Rest rooms are on the platform for Kyoto.
Restrooms are located on the platform for Kyoto.
Restrooms are located on the platform for Kyoto.

sen.j: なお自動改札機は東芝製が設置されている。
sen.e: Automated ticket gates installed are of Toshiba manufacture.
The automated ticket gates were manufactured by Toshiba.
The automated ticket gates were manufactured by Toshiba.

sen.j: 赤い自動改札機（EG-2000）は出場時2枚一括処理、PiTaPa・ICOCAに対応する。
sen.e: Red colored automated ticket gates (EG-000) can process two tickets together when exiting and are PiTaPa and ICOCA Cards compatible.
The red-colored automated ticket gates (EG-000) can process two tickets together when exiting and are compatible with the PiTaPa and ICOCA cards.
The red-colored automated ticket gates (EG-2000) can process two tickets together when exiting and are compatible with the PiTaPa and ICOCA cards.

sen.j: 利用状況
sen.e: Utilization status
Usage status
Usage status

sen.j: 2005年11月8日の調査結果によると、1日の利用客は7,853人。
sen.e: Survey conducted on Nov. 8, 2005 revealed that 7,853 passengers got off and on at this station on that day.
A survey conducted on Nov. 8, 2005 found that 7,853 passengers got off and on at this station on that day.
A survey conducted on November 8, 2005 revealed that the number of passengers who got on and off at this station on that day was 7,853.
sen.cmt: 表現を既出の記事と統一

sen.j: 近鉄の全調査対象駅（323駅、但し調査当時の数）中、85位。
sen.e: Ranked 85th amongst all Kintetsu stations (323 stations on date of survey) subject to the survey.
sen.cmt: "全調査対象"で言い尽くしていると思われますが、すなわち括弧内不要？
sen.e: It was ranked eighty-fifth among all Kintetsu stations (323 stations on date of survey) subject to the survey.
It was ranked eighty-fifth among all Kintetsu stations (323 stations on that date) subject to the survey.
sen.cmt: 表現を既出の記事と統一

sen.j: 京都線の駅（26駅、大和西大寺駅含む）の中では、16位。
sen.e: Ranked 16th amongst stations on Kyoto Line (26 stations including Yamato-Saidaiji Station.)
It was ranked sixteenth among stations on Kyoto Line (a total of 26 stations, including Yamato-Saidaiji Station.)
It was ranked sixteenth among stations on Kyoto Line (a total of 26 stations, including Yamato-Saidaiji Station.)

sen.j: 京都府内の近鉄の駅（23駅）の中では、14位。
sen.e: Ranked 14th amongst Kintetsu stations (23 stations) located in Kyoto Prefecture.
It was ranked fourteenth among Kintetsu stations (23 stations) located in Kyoto Prefecture.
It was ranked fourteenth among Kintetsu stations (23 stations) located in Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 歴史
sen.e: History
History
History

sen.j: 1928年（昭和3年）11月3日 奈良電気鉄道桃山御陵前駅～西大寺（現・大和西大寺駅）間開通時に開業。
sen.e: Inaugurated on Nov. 13, 1928 when the section between Momoyama Goryo-mae and Saidaiji (now Yamato-Saidaiji) Station on Nara Electric Railway opened for operations.
It was inaugurated on Nov. 13, 1928 when the section between Momoyama Goryo-mae and Saidaiji (now Yamato-Saidaiji) Station on Nara Electric Railway opened for operations.
November 3, 1928: The station was inaugurated when the section between Momoyama Goryo-mae Station and Saidaiji (now Yamato-Saidaiji) Station on Nara Electric Railway opened for operations.

sen.j: 1963年（昭和38年）10月1日 会社合併により近畿日本鉄道の駅となる。
sen.e: Became a Kintetsu Corporation station on Oct. 1, 1963 as a result of amalgamation.
It became a Kintetsu Corporation station on Oct. 1, 1963 as a result of the amalgamation.
October 1, 1963: The station became a Kintetsu Corporation station as a result of the amalgamation.

sen.j: 2007年（平成19年）4月1日 PiTaPa使用開始。
sen.e: Use of PiTaPa Cards commenced on April 1, 2007.
The use of PiTaPa cards commenced on April 1, 2007.
April 1, 2007: The use of PiTaPa cards commenced.
